title: betnomi

content: Guys, it's me again! This is the third round of 6 due to which the custom cold wallet will find its new owner. I took into account your wishes and now, starting from this round, we will have a lot of slots (please let me know if the raffle rules need to be improved). Good luck!Free shipping!I will announce the block number when we are full.Inactive not acceptedYour forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)After I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - rat03gopoh01 - Streissi02 - GazetaBitcoin03 - Little Mouse04 - xandry05 - 5tift06 - TopTort77707 - krogoth08 - Steeley09 - Real-Duke10 - QuakerBull11 - TheCryptoKid12 - Hotdog713 - Stackinsats77714 - Danydee15 -16 - wwzsocki17 -18 - notblox119 - Mbitr20 - mx12.levins21 - RÃ©mi Forte22 - tread9323 - 24 - famososMuertos25 - bullrun2020bro26 -27 -28 - bct_ail29 - Ryu_Ar130 -31 - montreal132 -33 - Heisenberg34 - CryptoYar35 - buckrogers36 - PawGo37 - Dernoste38 - -doubleU-39 - Pmalek40 - Harkorede41 - mocacinno42 - tweetious43 - cygan44 - naira45 - pinky123446 - NeuroticFish47 - Iroh48 - Koal-8449 - nara189250 - minerjones51 - Ratimov52 - aoluain53 - Becassine54 - PeakDK55 - lokas050656 - 2stout57 -58 -59 - Rizzrack60 - LTU_btc61 - PreciousMetapsICT62 -63 - bitbollo64 - HeRetiK65 -66 - Thiago00767 -68 - Remsjack69 - hookzup170 - Markzellers71 - owlcatz72 - please73 - ovcijisir74 - Willi997475 -76 - MoparMiningLLC77 - Amax1678 - WhyFhy79 - Darker4580 - YodasRedRocket81 - bestcoin_5982 - CoinageMint83 - haloxon84 - sunnybwoy85 - Inwestour86 - examplens87 - Krytowerk88 - Buchi-8889 -90 - delfastTions91 - Fundamentals92 - salad daging93 -94 -95 - BRINIRHA96 -97 - Doblezero98 -99 - JanEmilThis is the 3 round out of 6, and I can say with confidence that the winner of the first round was satisfied!Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 01, 2022, 03:01:20 PMArrived today! thanks!Additional photos:Quote
